title: Seniors Edition Digital Photography - 2014  UK
description:
Senior's Edition Digital Photography - 2014  UK

196 Pages | True PDF | English | 26 MB 


Learn how to take better photos with our essential guides to all genres of photography. Grasp the basic principles before mastering the mode dial and start getting creative with your camera. With starter projects from shooting group portraits to getting up close with macro, and top editing and sharing tips, you'll soon be taking fantastic shots in no time at all. Featuring: Getting started - Get to grips with the basic but fundamental aspects of photography, from aperture and white balance to composition and what to keep in your kit bag. Modes & settings - Understand how the mode dial works with in-depth guides to each of the major camera settings. From Program to Aperture, it's all covered here. Shooting skills - Develop your shooting skills for a range of photography styles including picture-perfect landscapes and eye-catching architecture. Editing- Perfect your photographs even after they've been taken. Learn to fix exposure, repair old photos, and much more.
